meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, TX

agenda_items.title: Approval of the October 2, 2023 Economic Development Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Development Services Monthly Technology and Metrics Review
agenda_items.description: Review of monthly technology and metrics by Development Services.

agenda_items.title: Fort Worth Avenue TIF District: Proposed Plan Amendment and Proposed Funding for Vista at Kessler/Stevens
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the proposed plan amendment and funding for a grocery-anchored retail redevelopment project.

agenda_items.title: City of Dallas Property Assessed Clean Energy (PACE) Program Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the PACE program by the Office of Economic Development.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item Regarding an Amendment to the Agreement with Island Rock Holdings, LLC
agenda_items.description: Discussion on an amendment to the agreement for the Longhorn Ballroom Redevelopment Project.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item Regarding Request for 12-Month Extension of Completion Date for Chapter 380 Grant Agreement
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the request for an extension of the completion date for the grant agreement with The Golden S.E.E.D.S Foundation.
